message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I've done some research and I believe it's a fair price for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,000?
I understand your perspective, Bob, but $8,000 is significantly below my minimum.  To make this work, I could go down to $10,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,500. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $9,500?
